title: World reacts to Mars discovery
text:
Space enthusiasts have taken to Twitter to respond to NASA’s discovery of water on Mars MATTHEW DUNN news.com.au Space enthusiasts have taken to Twitter to respond to NASA’s discovery of water on Mars MATTHEW DUNN news.com.au Twitter was hoping NASA was going to say something about MJ and ET. 
EARLIER this morning, NASA held a press conference to announce it has discovered the strongest evidence yet that liquid water flows intermittently on present-day Mars. 
As with all big announcements, Twitter users couldn’t refrain from entering the discussion with some hilarious responses. 
Here are some of the best. Other Stories
